page.title: 05Life-style
page.content: Before Ashton's community centre was opened people used the Parish Rooms, the W.I.hall ,the Primary school and the scout hut for meetings. When the old school could no longer be used by the children of Ashton Hayes, because of a faulty roof,the Parish Church sold the lease on the old school to the villagers of Ashton to make it into a community centre.The Man Power Service Commision made the old school into the centre.It took 4 years to carry out the main alterations and cost Â£25,000.It is going to be opened on the 13th of July 1985. A lot of people paid for the work including the parish council and the people of Ashton .The centre will be used for lots of actvities such as A.C.F., badminton, drama and social events . The doctor will also use it a surgery.
